Name: Update Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the update status and error messages.

TargetDetermined.Description: Indicates that a target resource or device for a image has been determined for update.
TargetDetermined.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a target resource or device for a image has been determined for update.
TargetDetermined.Message: The target device '%1' will be updated with image '%2'.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target that will be updated.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the device that will be updated.
This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.

AllTargetsDetermined.Description: Indicates that all target resources or devices for an update operation have been determined by the service.
AllTargetsDetermined.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that all target resources or devices for an update operation have been determined by the service.
AllTargetsDetermined.Message: All the target device to be updated have been determined.

UpdateInProgress.Description: Indicates that an update is in progress.
UpdateInProgress.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that an update is in progress.

TransferringToComponent.Description: Indicates that the service is transferring an image to a component.
TransferringToComponent.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the service is transferring an image to a component.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target receiving the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component receiving the image.

VerifyingAtComponent.Description: Indicates that a component is verifying an image.
VerifyingAtComponent.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a component is verifying an image.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target verifying the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component verifying the image.

InstallingOnComponent.Description: Indicates that a component is installing an image.
InstallingOnComponent.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a component is installing an image.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target installing the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component installing the image.

ApplyingOnComponent.Description: Indicates that a component is applying an image.
ApplyingOnComponent.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a component is applying an image.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target applying the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component applying the image.

TransferFailed.Description: Indicates that the service failed to transfer an image to a component.
TransferFailed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the service failed to transfer an image to a component.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target receiving the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component receiving the image.

VerificationFailed.Description: Indicates that the component failed to verify an image.
VerificationFailed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the component failed to verify an image.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target verifying the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component verifying the image.

ApplyFailed.Description: Indicates that the component failed to apply an image.
ApplyFailed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the component failed to apply an image.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target applying the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component applying the image.

ActivateFailed.Description: Indicates that the component failed to activate the image.
ActivateFailed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the component failed to activate the image.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target activating the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component activating the image.

AwaitToUpdate.Description: Indicates that the resource or device is awaiting for an action to proceed with installing an image.
AwaitToUpdate.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the resource or device is awaiting for an action to proceed with installing an image.
AwaitToUpdate.Message: Awaiting for an action to proceed with installing image '%1' on '%2'.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target awating for an action to install the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component awaiting for an action to install the image.
AwaitToUpdate.Resolution: Perform the requested action to advance the update operation.

AwaitToActivate.Description: Indicates that the resource or device is awaiting for an action to proceed with activating an image.
AwaitToActivate.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the resource or device is awaiting for an action to proceed with activating an image.
AwaitToActivate.Message: Awaiting for an action to proceed with activating image '%1' on '%2'.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the target awating for an action to activate the image.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.
This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the component awaiting for an action to activate the image.
AwaitToActivate.Resolution: Perform the requested action to advance the update operation.

UpdateSuccessful.Description: Indicates that a resource or device was updated.
UpdateSuccessful.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a resource or device was updated.
ArgDescriptions: The URI or name of the device that was updated.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the URI of the resource or a unique name of the device that was updated.
This argument shall contain the identifier for the image.

OperationTransitionedToJob.Description: Indicates that the update operation transitioned to a job for managing the progress of the operation.
OperationTransitionedToJob.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the update operation transitioned to a job for managing the progress of the operation.
OperationTransitionedToJob.Message: The update operation has transitioned to the job at URI '%1'.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the URI of the `Job` resource that is managing the progress of the update operation.
OperationTransitionedToJob.Resolution: Follow the referenced job and monitor the job for further updates.
